casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Scott Michael LENT, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157745-6
COA: 342683
342686 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 2, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the April 10, 2018 orders of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court.

VIVIANO, J., did not participate due to a familial relationship with the presiding circuit court judge in this case.
